instruction.br:
Vai começar o 'Torre de Londres'
Clique com o mouse para começar
instruction.us:
You are about to perform a task called the 'Tower of London'.
Your goal is to move a pile of disks from their original configuration to the configuration shown on the top of the screen. You can only move one disk at a time, and you cannot move a disk onto a pile that has no more room (indicated by the size of the grey rectangle). To move a disk, click on the pile you want to

training.br:
Antes de começar, reserve um momento para aprender o mapeamento entre as cores e as teclas.
Pressione as teclas [1, 2, 3 ou 4] consecutivamente para praticar os estímulos e a barra de espaço para iniciar o teste.
training.us:
Before we begin, take a moment to learn the mapping between colors and the keys.
Press the keys [1, 2, 3 or 4] consecutively to practice the stimuli, and space bar to begin the test.

nextLevel.br:
Passou da fase!
Clique na tela para continuar
nextLevel.us:
Trial Complete.
Click mouse to continue to the next trial.

loseByClick.br: Passou do máximo numero de cliques
loseByClick.us:
Trial Incomplete.
You failed to complete the problem in the number of moves required.
Click screen to move on to the next problem.

explain_level2.br:
Desta vez, nomeie as cores das palavras o mais rápido possível.
Siga o retângulo de borda branca e pressione a tecla correta [1, 2, 3 ou 4] de acordo.

Pressione qualquer tecla para começar.
explain_level2.us:
This time, name the colors of the words as quickly as you can.
Follow the white border rectangle and press the correct key [1, 2, 3 or 4] accordingly.

Press any key to begin.

explain_level3.br:
Novamente, nomeie as cores em que as palavras são impressas o mais rápido possível. Não leia a palavra! Em vez disso, nomeie a cor na qual a palavra foi impressa.

Pressione qualquer tecla para começar.
explain_level3.us:
Again, name the colors in which the words are printed as quickly as you can. Don't read the word! Instead, name the color in which the word is printed.

Press any key to begin.

end.us:
You are now finished!
Thank you for participating.
